snippet: To the Editor:    I am astounded by Senator Dianne Feinstein's statement on the Federal Bureau of Investigation's warnings of possible illegal campaign contributions (news article, March 10). You report that Ms. Feinstein said that while ''the inf...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: I am astounded by Senator Dianne Feinstein's statement on the Federal Bureau of Investigation's warnings of possible illegal campaign contributions (news article, March 10). You report that Ms. Feinstein said that while ''the information was vague and nonspecific,'' she had concluded that she should be ''very cautious'' in dealing with Asian-American contributors.
abstract: Laura E Wong letter accuses US Sen Dianne Feinstein of making insinuating remarks about Asian-Americans in March 10 article on warning she received from Federal Bureau of Investigation about illegal campaign contributions (S)

headline.main: Legalisms Don't Improve Flavor of Campaign Fund-Raising
